name: Mutiny on the Clodia
description:
It's finally time to enjoy that vacation you've always dreamed of. All your hard-earned savings went into what will surely be the time of your life. Unless...

This is a short adventure game made for the $105 Adventure Game Challenge (26 September - 10 October 2021) whose theme was: an escape.

Left click performs the cursor interaction, right click looks.

By default the text will wait for the user's click to advance. You can change to timed text with the toggle on the upper right corner of the screen.

NOTE: do not save and exit during a dialogue. It will mess up your savegame and you'll have to restart.
